resources.string: Guidelines
Guideline addition
Guideline modification
You have no guidelines in this treatment. Please add a new guideline.
Description
Images
Videos
The URL must contain a valid prefix (https://, http://) and a valid image extension (.jpg, .jpeg, .png, .gif).
The URL must contain a valid prefix (https://, http://) and a valid video extension (.mp4, .3gp, .avi, .mov) or belong to YouTube.
After adding the guideline, explanatory images or videos can be included by modifying it.

Add video
